item.title: * Delete
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Hmm, do the following at school. Throw a piece of bubble gum under him just before he goes to sit down. If you have a school uniform with a pocket on the front where his boobs are then grab the pocket and yank it off, if done correctly his boobs will flop out. When he is following you and your friends around get you and your friends to ditch him as a joke, seeming he is fat I assume he is no usaine bolt and wont catch you. Or just decide to do a lot of physical activity with your friends and see if he can keep up. Tell everyone he was jacking off in the bathroom or something. I may sound evil but I was a little rascal in the early days of high school.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Here’s one solution. Some even labeled it as the ‘last solution’:

en.wikipedia.org

The Holocaust

The Holocaust, also referred to as the Shoah,[b] was a genocide during World War II in which Adolf Hitler's Nazi Germany, aided by its collaborators, systematically murdered some six million European Jews, around two-thirds of the Jewish population of Europe, between 1941 and 1945.[c] Jews were targeted for extermination as part of a larger event involving the persecution and murder of other groups, including in particular the Roma, ethnic Poles, and "incurably sick", as well as political oppo Ge...

item.title: * Delete
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Elrick:

They don’t sound like very good friends if they’re going to ditch you over money. If he’s going to try to keep coming over then lure your friends back then say he’s not invited, if your friends ask what your problem is then explain how he eats your food then ditches you so they can go back with him. If they can’t understand what’s going on after you lay it out then they don’t sound like friends at all. You sound like you still have more friends than those two, so don’t feel discouraged to let go of fake friends.

Thanks, appreciate the honestly.

Read full topic

item.title: * Delete
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:11, topic:489105”][quote author=Lin link=topic=607338.msg4228709#msg4228709 date=1361134699]
I feel like there have been several TV show episodes about this kind of thing. You have to think outside the box and do something that humiliates him in front of people but it doesn’t seem like your fault. An example would be you give him a candy bar but inside of it is something gross that might make him sick or makes him flip out, like there’s a spider on it. When nobody’s around, go up to him and tell him not to mess with you anymore or you’ll do something worse next time. Make him feel smaller than you.
[/quote]

Well now that it’s that kind of situation with food, tweak it a little. Put a lock on your pantry door. Say it was your mom’s idea. Take the cheetos out and hide them, or like I said before, do something to the cheetos so next time he eats them he gets sick. When you two are alone, warn him like I said.[/quote]

I like that lock idea, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: * Delete
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Lin:

I feel like there have been several TV show episodes about this kind of thing. You have to think outside the box and do something that humiliates him in front of people but it doesn’t seem like your fault. An example would be you give him a candy bar but inside of it is something gross that might make him sick or makes him flip out, like there’s a spider on it. When nobody’s around, go up to him and tell him not to mess with you anymore or you’ll do something worse next time. Make him feel smaller than you.

Well now that it’s that kind of situation with food, tweak it a little. Put a lock on your pantry door. Say it was your mom’s idea. Take the cheetos out and hide them, or like I said before, do something to the cheetos so next time he eats them he gets sick. When you two are alone, warn him like I said.

item.title: * Delete
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Bowser jr:

Either get rich or get new friends. It is clear that they don’t really like you.

They like me a lot as we hangout quite often, that dudes just always tagging along.

Travas:

So, you and your friends are at your house and he comes over too and starts eating your food? You just let that shit go down?

No they always bring him along because he buys them things. But he always raids my pantry while he’s here, usually while we’re upstairs. I’ve told him to stop several times, but the situations always the same. I walk into the kitchen to see him chowing down on my stash of Cheetos, tell him to stop, he says alright then repeats the action next time my friends bring him.
